name: bikeclub/bikeclub_starter
description: Install admin tools and user roles.

suggest.bikeclub/bikeclub_announcements: Adds an Announcement content type. Announcements are published for a scheduled period of time and displayed on the home page
suggest.bikeclub/bikeclub_faqs: Adds a FAQs content type to provide information in a question-and-answer format in collapsible fields.
